categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Mac Ewevs was a male Human storm commando captain who served in the Stormtrooper Corps during the Galactic Civil War.

In 1 BBY, Captain Ewevs and some other elite soldiers were hired by Governor of Concord Dawn Purton to kill bounty hunter Boba Fett. The squad failed and was later tracked by Fett who captured Mac Ewevs on Blackfel.
